    • Method Detail

      • findById

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public ResourceMetadata findById(int id)
                                                         throws ResourceNotFoundException
        findById method: Returns an ResourceMetadata object when the id int matches a record in the database.
        Parameters:
        id - resourceMetadataId int
        Returns:
        a ResourceMetadata with matching id
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - when a ResourceMetadata is not found

      • save

        @Transactional
public ResourceMetadata save(ResourceMetadata newResource)
                                      throws ResourcePersistenceException
        save Method: Takes in a ResourceMetadata object as the input. The input ResourceMetadata object is tested to ensure that it is not null. If the ResourceMetadata object is null then it will throw a ResourceNotFoundException. Once the ResourceMetadata object passes the test it is then added or persisted to the database.
        Parameters:
        newResource - ResourceMetadata object that is inputted and saved
        Returns:
        The newly saved ResourceMetadata object
        Throws:
        ResourcePersistenceException

      • update

        @Transactional
public ResourceMetadata update(ResourceMetadata updatedResource)
        Update Method: The ResourceMetadata object is inputted and changes are saved. The modified object is returned.
        Parameters:
        updatedResource - ResourceMetadata object that is inputted
        Returns:
        updated/modified ResourceMetadata object

      • findbyCreator

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public ResourceMetadata findbyCreator(int id)
                                                              throws ResourceNotFoundException
        findbyCreator Method: Returns an resource metadata object when the creatorId int matches a record in the database.
        Parameters:
        id - appUserId int
        Returns:
        a ResourceMetadata with matching id
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - when a ResourceMetadata is not found
